caption.center: FLOYD L. KIRKPATRICK, PLAINTIFF-RESPONDENT, v. ALFRED W. MUELLER, AND AL

court.center: Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District,

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM CIRCUIT COURT, ST. LOUIS COUNTY; RICHARD ENRIGHT, JUDGE.
opinion.attorneys:
James Peter Leonard, Belleville, Ill., for defendants-appellants.
Bertram W. Tremayne, Clayton, for plaintiff-respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER
This is an action on a promissory note in which a jury found for plaintiff and judgment was rendered in plaintiff's favor for $12,125.91.
An extended opinion would have no precedential value. The judgment is affirmed in compliance with Rule 84.16(b).Page 443
